attributes.action: BRITISH MILITARY INTERVENTION IN SYRIA PLEASE - ACTION, NOT WORDS - DEMOCRACY MUST BE SUPPORTED
attributes.additional_details:
The British Government must take a righteous stand for democracy in the Middle East .

The British people call on the Government to immediately intervene militarily in Syria to prevent the continuing massacre of civilians.

Its time to get off the fence, even if we have to stand alone in the fight for democracy and basic human rights.
